message.body: Hey grawp. How's your weekend going?
Good, actually. I'm on my way to Maker Faire in San Mateo, CA
It's basically a show and tell, except on a much bigger scale. :)
Excellent. What sorts of things do people typically make to show and tell at this fair?
About to head to pick up a few groceries. Mostly just cleaning and going about my daily maintenance today.
(1/2)Hey, sorry I couldn't reply earlier. There were robots, steampunk vehicles, crazy bicycles, R2D2s and a whole lot of other stuff. Kind of a tech-meets-art
Nice. Sounds pretty sweet. Were you participating or just spectating?
I was just spectating. It happens every year in the SF bay area, I'm hoping I'll be able to go next year too.
Pretty good. About to head into a meeting. How bout yourself?
On my way to work. Have a good day!
